name: Al Cielo VR: pre-alpha
description:
Al Cielo is a senior capstone game from the University of California, Santa Cruz's graduating class of 2021. ~Set to release SUMMER 2021~

So far, here's what we've got! We'll try to update this weekly as we get closer and closer to releasing an Alpha (:

Our team is made up of 11 UCSC students, all pursuing degrees in game design. We are striving to make a game that is lighthearted and displays parts of Mexican culture that our members and members of the broader Latinx community can recognize themselves in.

We are in week 11 of production, as of 2/12/2021 and will be releasing a build later this week. These screenshots are representative of the work our developers and artists have been doing until now.

Follow our progress on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlCieloGame
